snippet: The convertible uses the same 5.8-liter supercharged V-8 engine as the GT500 coupe, claimed by Ford to be the most powerful production V-8 in the world.
abstract: The convertible uses the same 5.8-liter supercharged V-8 engine as the GT500 coupe, claimed by Ford to be the most powerful production V-8 in the world.
lead_paragraph: Last November, when Ford showed the 2013 Shelby GT500 in Los Angeles, the automaker called the coupe the fastest production Mustang ever produced. Talk of horsepower ratings, track times and live rear axles would have their day in the midwinter sun as well, as Ford released information on the 2013 Shelby GT500 convertible ahead of its debut at the Chicago auto show, where press previews are taking place Wednesday and Thursday.

headline.main: Ford Shelby GT500 Convertible: A Summertime Snake in Midwinter Chicago
